definition: a transparent piece of diamond that has been cut and polished and is valued as a precious gem

positive_examples: This is an example of diamond.
We observed diamond in this context.
A typical case of diamond would involve these features.
The concept of diamond applies here.
A crystalline form of carbon with exceptional hardness and brilliance, valued as both gemstone and industrial material.
negative_examples: This is an example of snowflake, not diamond.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Snowflake, or other types of Crystal
